Job_Description: <div><strong>Job Type:</strong> Permanent <br/> <strong>Primary Location:</strong> Toronto, Ontario, Canada <br/> <strong>All Available Locations:</strong> Toronto<br/> <div> External Posting Description <br/><br/> Deloitte’s <strong>Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning practice (AI and ML)</strong> practice is comprised of specialized experts with hands-on experience, and cutting-edge information assets that facilitate successful Artificial Intelligence (AI) transformations. We develop AI-enabled solutions to address all aspects of a client’s transformative journey with disciplined focus on business outcomes. <br/><br/> <strong>Your role at Deloitte as a GIS Lead Manager</strong> <ul> <li>Provide subject matter expertise to enable the development of geospatial methodologies to support client deliverables</li><li>Acquire, process, and analyze large quantities of data (spatial and aspatial) at a granular level</li><li>Research, review, and analyze the effectiveness and efficiency of existing methodologies. Develop strategies for enhancing or further leveraging these best practices within a geospatial context</li><li>Perform “hands on” spatial data ETL, GIS analysis, modelling, and visualization to deliver best-of-breed analytical solutions for clients’ business problem</li><li>Participate in various structured and ad-hoc projects with cross-functional teams within Deloitte</li><li>Leverage a diverse team consisting of data scientists, data architects, software developers, information designers, and other business/industry subject matter experts to deliver meaningful client deliverables</li><li>Actively participate in client pitches and proposals, leveraging your experience delivering geospatial solutions to enhance Deloitte’s offerings.</li> </ul> External Posting Qualifications <ul> <li>10+ years relevant work experience as a GIS Manager, Geospatial Consultant or GIS Specialist</li><li>Broad knowledge of how GIS is used across various industries (Retail, Government, Oil & Gas, Utilities, Finance)</li><li>Experience designing and implementing large-scale spatial analysis solutions</li><li>Spatial data manipulation and analysis experience using (one or more of): ArcGIS, QGIS, PostGIS, Python (GeoPandas), SQL Server (working with spatial data), R, Mapshaper or similar tools as required</li><li>Strong track record with an exemplary ability to quickly understand business problems, develop solutions and insights, and communicate both internally and externally to stakeholders</li><li>Professional services, consulting, or advisory experience is an asset</li><li>Strong oral and written communication skills</li><li>Enthusiastic about solving complex problems with a variety of analytical tools</li><li>Strong experience working with large amounts of data with significant ambiguity, developing creative approaches to analytical problems, and interpreting data and results from a business/industry perspective</li><li>Preference given to candidates with experience in (geospatial) statistical modelling techniques, data mining, and predictive models</li><li>Minimum of BA/BSc degree in a quantitative degree including Geography, GIS, Geomatics, Spatial Analysis, Statistics, Demography, Computer Science, Engineering, or related field is required. Advanced degree (MA/MSc, equivalent or higher) is preferred</li> </ul> </div> <br/><strong>Why Deloitte?</strong> <br/><br/> Launch your career with The One Firm where you can make a greater impact than you ever thought possible. With endless opportunities at every turn, and a culture built to support and drive our people to be the very best they can be, Deloitte is The One Firm for you to learn, grow, create, and lead. <br/><br/> At Deloitte, we understand that everyone, and their career goals, are different. As a firm, we help create the conditions and opportunities that will enable our people to thrive – both professionally and personally. The One Firm. For You.</strong></em> <br/><br/> Deloitte is an inclusive employer dedicated to building a diverse workforce. We encourage applications from all qualified candidates and will accommodate applicants’ needs under the respective provincial human rights codes throughout all stages of the recruitment and selection process. Please advise the Recruiter to ensure your accessibility needs are accommodated throughout this process. Information received relating to accommodation will be addressed confidentially. <br/><br/> We thank all applicants in advance for their interest; however, only those candidates selected for an interview will be contacted <br/><br/> 35823</div>

Job_Description: FULL-TIME POSITION <br/><br/> WHO WE ARE <br/> Terramera is an award-winning Vancouver, Canada-based sustainable agriculture cleantech company using chemistry, machine learning and AI technologies to develop and optimize safer, more effective plant-based replacements to toxic chemical pesticides and synthetic fertilizers. <br/><br/> Our company name comes from the Latin word terra (Earth) and the Hindi and Punjabi words tera (yours) and mera (mine), meaning: Our Earth (yours and mine). <br/><br/> WHY US? <br/> Our goals are big, hairy and audacious. Were striving to reduce the use of toxic chemical pesticides by 80%, help increase global food production by 20% and benefit over a billion people. Our unique and proprietary technologies enable us to increase the efficacy of active ingredients by delivering them into target cells, which results in revolutionary, high-performance plant-based products for conventional and organic agriculture, professional and home use. <br/><br/> POSITION SUMMARY <br/> As part of Terrameras Technology & Discovery (T&D) team, you will contribute to the development of high-throughput insecticide screening assays, including anthropod mortality assays, behavioural bioassays and insect recognition assessments. You will contribute to rearing insects, as well as developing and executing in-vitro laboratory assays and in-vivo tests on insect-infested plants. Assays will involve a broad range of sucking and chewing anthropod pest species. You will apply your understanding of insect physiology and behaviour to interpret insect's interactions with insecticide treatments in various assay environments to optimize product efficacy. Assay development includes optical imaging to count, size and recognize insectpests, as well as to assess plant damage. <br/><br/> You will work closely with Terramera Engineering to ground-truth the imaging data and assist with assay automation. Work will be conducted at our lab and greenhouse and include interfacing with our field research team in California to correlate lab, greenhouse and field data. <br/><br/> RESPONSIBILITIES <br/><br/> Devise procedures to capture assay end points using imaging, including morphological, temporal and behavioral differentiation of various pests; <br/> Optimize insect assay protocols to maximize sensitivity, differentiation and test materials and reproducibility; <br/> Devise procedures to capture assay end points using imaging; <br/> Assist in designing workflows for automated data acquisition; and <br/><br/> Source insects and maintain colonies. <br/><br/> <strong>Requirements</strong>: <br/> B.Sc. or M.Sc. in Biology with specific experience in Entomology; <br/> Experience in using imaging for insect assays; and <br/><br/> Experience with agricultural insect pests or model insects an asset. <br/><br/> QUALITIES WERE LOOKING FOR <br/><br/> Self-Starter <br/><br/> Proactive <br/><br/> Learner <br/><br/> Observant & Analytical <br/><br/> Creative & Innovative <br/><br/> Team Player <br/><br/> LOCATION <br/><br/> Terramera Lab - 164 West 5 th Avenue, Vancouver, BC <br/><br/> Terramera is committed to a diverse workforce and we are an equal opportunity employer. <br/><br/> Our success begins with our people. Were looking for A-Players who are passionate about making a difference as we are and thrive in environments that are dynamic, challenging and rewarding. Join our movement, as we set a new standard and change the world together as a highly dedicated, innovative, future-focused and solutions-oriented team. <br/><br/> While we thank all applicants for their interest, only short-listed candidates will be contacted. For more information on Terramera, please visit our website at www.terramera.com
Title: Entomologist

Job_Description: <p>For two decades, NVIDIA has pioneered visual computing, the art and science of computer graphics. With our invention of the GPU - the engine of modern visual computing - the field has expanded to encompass video games, movie production, product design, medical diagnosis and scientific research. Today, visual computing is becoming increasingly central to how people interact with technology, and there has never been a more exciting time to join this critical team.</p><p></p><p>Research in artificial intelligence is booming worldwide. NVIDIA is in the best position to take deep learning to previously unimagined levels with our GPU technology, which addresses the massive computational needs of deep learning and are widely used in the field.</p><p></p><p>Our Content & Technology group is now looking for a Senior Deep Learning Animation Engineer to help us apply AI techniques to character animation systems. Your extensive experience with animation in the gaming or visual effects industry, combined with our Toronto-based team of experienced AI professionals will help bring movie and gaming characters to life like never before.</p><p></p><p><b>What you’ll be doing:</b></p><ul><li><p>Play a leading role in building tools and technology libraries to help power AI driven animation systems for applications both inside and outside NVIDIA</p></li><li><p>Be involved in advanced research combining physical simulation with autonomous animation systems to achieve state of the art results that appear indistinguishable from real motion</p></li><li><p>Work with other senior developers within NVIDIA's Content and Technology group to integrate these tools with existing animation systems inside games and VFX systems</p></li><li><p>Research the best ways to apply Deep Learning techniques to improve traditional motion capture pipelines</p></li><li><p>Lead and mentor others involved in this work, helping to build their knowledge of traditional animation techniques as they apply their experience in AI to this type of real-time application</p></li></ul><p></p><p><b>What we need to see:</b></p><ul><li><p>Bachelors or MS in Computer Science or related field with 5+ years of experience, including at least 2 years of animation experience</p></li><li><p>Expertise in computer graphics, simulation or game development</p></li><li><p>Experience with C++, DirectX, OpenGL</p></li><li><p>Expertise with content creation pipeline tools such as Maya, Max, or Houdini, as well as their APIs</p></li><li><p>Strong software engineering skills</p></li></ul><p></p><p><b>Ways to stand out from the crowd:</b></p><ul><li>Previous experience with machine learning</li><li>Experience with motion capture hardware and software tools</li><li>Strong ability to communicate well and teach others.</li><li>Demonstrate your interest in applying cutting edge technologies to revolutionize the way artists and animators create games and films for generations to come</li></ul><p></p><p>NVIDIA is widely considered to be one of the technology world’s most desirable employers. We have some of the most brilliant and talented people in the world working for us. If you're creative and autonomous, we want to hear from you!</p><p></p><p>NVIDIA is committed to fostering a diverse work environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. As we highly value diversity in our current and future employees, we do not discriminate (including in our hiring and promotion practices) on the basis of race, religion, colour, national origin, gender, gender expression, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, disability status or any other characteristic protected by law.</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p>#deeplearning
Title: Senior Deep Learning Animation Engineer

Job_Description: Are you ready to seize an opportunity to drive leading edge technology solutions with the customer? Do you value deploying and working on the latest solutions with real world impact? Do you thrive by mentoring and leading by example? Would you love to help us accelerate the transformation towards data-driven organizations? Do you want to join an elite and distinguished team? <br/><br/> If so, the Data and AI Consultant position in the Microsoft Services Organization is for you! <br/><br/> At Microsoft, we share knowledge, experiences, and resources to help each other achieve our career goals and grow both professionally and personally. We seek out people from diverse backgrounds who exhibit passion, technical competence, and experience in services delivery with complex projects or environments. Experience in this role will provide great opportunities to interact with break-through technologies, collaborate with product development teams and improve future versions of Microsoft products as a subject matter expert. Together, we can help billions of people around the globe using digital technology to achieve amazing things. <br/><br/> Our consultants work with the latest technologies to design, build, optimize data-centric solutions, and help our customers unlock the value of their data. We apply our broad and deep technology combined with a strong industry knowledge. As part of our team, you will deliver solutions to customers around the world. You will play a key role in allowing out clients to maximize their investment in Microsoft technology and introduce them to emerging technologies and solutions – to grow and optimize their business. To be successful, you will take advantage of our community of consultants, through sharing solutions and utilizing your early access to technology. You’ll be part of something bigger, through unleashing the power of data and crafting solutions to meet customer needs. You will provide technical leadership for other consultant teams and engage in the complete lifecycle of large data-driven projects. Your key to success is your passion for customers, demonstrated through professionalism and striving for excellence in all aspects of the customer experience: understanding and optimizing databases and data visualization, designing and developing solutions, and delivering with high quality on challenging engagements.<br/><br/>Responsibilities  <ul> <li><div>Be part of a thriving practice that's constantly looking for ways to improve our customers’ experience</div> </li><li><div>Work with customers to identify business requirements</div> </li><li><div>Craft both high-level and detailed design documents and implement innovative solutions using the most recent technologies</div> </li><li><div>Optimize customer’s current data solutions and infrastructure</div> </li><li><div>Continually learn and grow professionally</div> </li><li><div>Take a leadership role on projects</div> </li><li><div>Mentor other consultants to share your knowledge and experience</div> </li> </ul>  Qualifications<br/><br/>• Deep technical or architectural knowledge of at least 2 of the following areas: <br/> o Database administration (preferably with SQL, including Azure SQL) – performance tuning, trouble-shooting, high availability / disaster recovery, security <br/> o Database development (preferably with SQL, including Azure SQL) – designing and building database solutions (tables / stored procedures / forms / queries / etc.) <br/> o Business intelligence – combining knowledge of SSIS/SSAS/SSRS/Power BI technologies with a deep understanding of data structure / data models to design, develop, and tune BI solutions and reports <br/> o Advanced data analytics – designing and building solutions using technologies such as Azure Data Factory, Azure Data Lake, HD Insights, SQL DWH, stream analytics, machine learning, R server.   <ul> <li>B.Sc./B.A. or equivalent work experience combined with a relevant industry experience in a consulting role. Minimum3 years of experience.</li> <li>Ability to travel domestically and internationally and work with diverse cultures and customers</li> <li>Fluency in written and spoken English</li> <li>Ability to communicate with a variety of different audiences and strong presentation skills</li> <li>Demonstrated ability to match technical solutions with customer business requirements</li> <li>Ability to lead and motivate technical communities</li> <li>Ability to effectively recognize and adapt to change</li> <li>Ability to quickly grasp customers’ business challenges and drive positive change <br/><br/> Considering a Career with Microsoft Canada? At Microsoft Canada, people are the source of our energy. The people at Microsoft Canada are creative, from all types of backgrounds, bringing passion and new ideas, meeting challenges, and realizing their potential. Our benefits and resources are designed to keep our most important asset - our employees - healthy, happy and equipped with the resources they need to be successful and realize their full potential. Microsoft Canada provides a flexible work environment, with career advancement potential and most importantly, the opportunity to make a difference. <br/><br/> As a Microsoft employee you have the opportunity to participate in the following programs: <br/><br/> • Stock Awards & Employee Stock Purchase Plan <br/><br/> • Registered Retirement Savings Plan <br/><br/> • Employee Software Purchase Program <br/><br/> • Fitness Membership & Subsidy <br/><br/> • I Volunteer (5 Paid Volunteer Days) <br/><br/> • Employee Assistance Program And so much more… <br/><br/> At Microsoft, we share a passion for technology, customers and our partners. What will make us great is our commitment to our mission of enabling people and businesses throughout the world to realize their full potential. Please notify Microsoft if you require accommodation in respect of the materials or procedures used at any time during this process. If you require accommodation Microsoft will work with you to determine how to meet your need.</li>  </ul>

Job_Description: Facebook's mission is to give people the power to build community and bring the world closer together. Through our family of apps and services, we're building a different kind of company that connects billions of people around the world, gives them ways to share what matters most to them, and helps bring people closer together. Whether we're creating new products or helping a small business expand its reach, people at Facebook are builders at heart. Our global teams are constantly iterating, solving problems, and working together to empower people around the world to build community and connect in meaningful ways. Together, we can help people build stronger communities we're just getting started.In this role, you will embed deeply with researchers at Facebook AI Research (FAIR) and develop experiments and prototypes at the frontier of AI Research. You will need to engage with research topics and cover new domains quickly; build deep expertise with Facebook data and tools; apply high standards to the research code around you and develop an ability to identify highly impactful projects in a complex and unexplored domain. You will gain valuable experience in artificial intelligence and AI, publish academic papers and help push forward the understanding of learning and intelligent systems. <br/><br/> To learn more about our research visit https://research.facebook.com (https://research.facebook.com/). <br/><br/> <strong>Responsibilities:</strong>  <ul> <li>Develop highly scalable algorithms based on state-of-the-art machine learning and neural network methodologies.</li><li>Collaborate with Facebook AI Research (FAIR) Scientists to facilitate research that enables learning the semantics of data (images, video, text, audio, and other modalities).</li><li>Apply knowledge of relevant research domains along with expert coding skills to platform and framework development projects.</li><li>Adapt machine learning and neural network algorithms and architectures to best exploit modern parallel environments (e.g. distributed clusters, multicore SMP, and GPU).</li> </ul>  <strong>Mininum Qualifications:</strong>  <ul> <li>Currently holding a full-time software engineering or relevant role at a company, university, or government lab.</li><li>B.S. degree in Computer Science or related quantitative field.</li><li>Experience in developing and debugging in C/C++ and/or Python.</li><li>Ability to obtain and maintain work authorization in the country of employment in 2018.</li> </ul>  <strong>Preferred Qualifications:</strong>  <ul> <li>1+ year(s) experience in a software engineering role with emphasis on machine learning and optimization.</li><li>M.S. degree in Computer Science or related quantitative field.</li><li>Experience building systems based on machine learning (especially deep learning) methods.</li><li>Experience using frameworks like PyTorch, Caffe2, Tensorflow, Theano, Keras, and/or Chainer.</li><li>Experience with storage systems, distributed systems, HPC, compilers, and/or CUDA programming.</li> </ul>

Job_Description: <strong>AI Researcher</strong><br/><br/>Automat is looking for talented and experienced AI Researchers that are proud and passionate about their craft. You love research and are up to date on all the latest advancements in natural language processing, deep learning, reinforcement learning, computer vision and related fields but you also care about seeing your research make it into products. You are resourceful, self-motivated and pride yourself on your creativity and ability to design elegant solutions to hard problems. You communicate well and love working as part of an amazing team.<br/><br/><strong>Job Description</strong><br/><br/>As an AI Researcher, you will be responsible for developing natural language understanding and dialog models across a variety of languages using a mix of deep learning, reinforcement learning and other techniques. You will do foundational research to improve the state of the art for messaging based chatbots and conversational marketing. <br/><br/> Our company culture encourages everyone to contribute new ideas to make our platform the best on the market. As an AI Researcher, you will identify new opportunities, build experimental prototypes, work closely with our design & engineering team to translate your research into product features and gather user feedback to improve our platform over time.<br/><br/><strong>Profile</strong> <br/> <ul>   <li>Ph.D., Masters or relevant work experience in Machine Learning, Applied Mathematics, Computer Science, Computational Linguistics, Question Answering, Machine Reading, Computer Vision or a related field</li> <li>Strong understanding of deep neural networks and their applications to natural language processing</li> <li>Academic or industrial background on language modeling, dialog state tracking, reinforcement learning, optimization and language internationalization are a definite plus.</li> <li>A track record of published papers in major conferences</li>   <li>Ability to design models and contribute to the production system with high-quality code. You care about productizing your research!</li> <li>Excellent problem solving and analytical thinking skills, ability to tackle hard problems and produce stepwise solutions</li> <li>Hands on experience with Java or Python and related machine learning libraries such as Tensorflow r Theano.</li> <li>The seniority of the position will be decided upon the candidate's profile</li> </ul> <strong>Bonus points for experience with</strong>  <ul>   <li>NLP libraries like CoreNLP, ClearNLP or NLTK</li> <li>Plotting libraries such as D3.js or Plotly</li> <li>Scala and Javascript</li> <li>Akka actors, Akka-HTTP and Akka-Streams</li> </ul>  <br/> <strong>About Automat</strong><br/><br/>Automat's aim is to let companies use AI to talk to their customers over popular messaging apps to understand them and serve them better. Here’s some recent press about us:  <ul>   <li>http://betakit.com/10-montreal-tech-companies-to-watch-in-2017/</li> <li>http://finance.yahoo.com/news/cb-insights-reveals-ai-100-150000872.html</li> <li>http://www.cbc.ca/news/technology/canada-artificial-intelligence-companies-montreal-talent-1.3890556</li> <li>http://adage.com/article/digital/covergirl-chatbot/307052/</li> <li>https://medium.com/slack-developer-blog/investing-in-the-future-of-work-d4ffb87f985#.es1xu0yjm</li> <li>http://fortune.com/2016/07/19/slack-app-investment-fund-2/</li> </ul> Learn more at www.automat.ai, or message us at m.me/automatinc

Job_Description: Company Profile <br/><br/> Morgan Stanley is a global financial services firm and a market leader in investment banking, securities, investment management and wealth management services. With offices in more than 43 countries, the people of Morgan Stanley are dedicated to providing our clients the finest thinking, products and services to help them achieve even the most challenging goals. <br/><br/> As a market leader, the talent and passion of our people is critical to our success. We embrace integrity, excellence, team work and giving back. <br/><br/> Technology <br/><br/> The Technology division partners with our business units and leading technology companies to redefine how we do business in ever more global and dynamic financial markets. <br/><br/> Our sizeable investment in technology results in leading-edge tools, software, and systems. Our insights, applications, and infrastructure give a competitive edge to clients’ businesses—and to our own. <br/><br/> Institutional Securities Technology (IST) develops and oversees the overall technology strategy and bespoke technology solutions to drive and enable the Institutional businesses and enterprise-wide functions. Our clients include Fixed Income, Equities, Commodities, Investment Banking, Research and Global Capital Markets as well as Operations, HR and Corporate Services. <br/><br/> Position Description: <br/><br/> Morgan Stanley Machine Learning (MSML) is Morgan Stanley's center of excellence responsible for working with business and IT teams across the firm to solve mission-critical problems. We are a highly motivated and collaborative team consisting of data scientists, machine learning engineers and members from academia. Our team is uniquely positioned to apply advanced AI to revenue generating business cases. <br/><br/> Responsibilities: <br/><br/> - Lead machine learning projects and develop models in collaboration with strats, quants and traders   <ul> <li>Independently work on end-to-end development of models using trading data, market data, alternative data and data from other internal/external data sources</li> <li>Bring deep learning insight into econometric modeling</li> <li>Mentor and lead relatively junior members of the team</li> <li>Work with stakeholders to refine requirements and communicate progress</li> <li>Rapidly prototype and iteratively develop models</li> <li>Deploy models to production and monitor performance</li> <li>Study recent research and develop original ideas to solve hard problems</li> <li>Speak in internal and external forums <br/><br/> Required: <br/><br/> - Research level understanding of deep learning architectures, their applicability to data and optimal training strategies</li> <li>In-depth knowledge of deep learning networks like DNN, CNN, RNN, Auto Encoder, GAN and VAE</li> <li>At least 3 years of exclusive experience in deep learning</li> <li>Strong command over linear algebra and statistics</li> <li>Ability to quickly translate ideas to efficient, elegant code in Python and Tensorflow</li> <li>Research oriented mindset with a natural ability to combine traditional techniques and cutting-edge research to develop novel models</li> <li>Experience in model training in a GPU environment</li> <li>Experience in leading a team of researchers and research engineers</li> <li>5-10 years of machine learning experience</li> <li>Excellent communication and presentation skills</li> <li>PhD in Computer Science or Machine Learning <br/><br/> Desired: <br/><br/> - Experience in time series analysis and sequential data using ARIMA, Kalman Filters, HMM, RNN etc.</li> <li>Reinforcement learning experience in continuous state/action space is highly desirable</li> <li>Experience in Bayesian Modeling using MCMC, SeqMC and newer techniques like Variational Bayes</li> <li>Research publications <br/><br/> Knowledge of French and English are required. <br/><br/> Morgan Stanley is an equal opportunities employer. We work to provide a supportive and inclusive environment where all individuals can maximize their full potential.<br/><br/></li> </ul>
Title: Deep Learning Lead

Job_Description: <div>// See English version below … // <br/><br/> Titre : Spécialiste en apprentissage automatique <br/><br/> Relève de : Directeur de LABS <br/><br/> Fonctions : <ul> <li>Responsable du développement de la vision par ordinateur et des technologies d'apprentissage par machine pour le déploiement de jeux vidéo ;</li><li>Expérimenter avec des données réelles pour valider, évaluer et améliorer les algorithmes ;</li><li>Responsable de la production des algorithmes CV / ML dans les fonctionnalités du produit, avec le soutien et les conseils d'autres équipes d'ingénierie système ;</li><li>Profiler les éléments logiciels, développez et exécutez des tests de performance, aidez à minimiser les inefficacités / la latence et améliorez les performances ;</li><li>Configurer et gérer l''intégration continue' pour les fonctionnalités et les versions ;</li><li>Coordonner le développement avec les équipes interfonctionnelles basées localement, mais aussi ailleurs dans la compagnie ;</li><li>Concevoir, former et déployer des réseaux de neurones pour des fonctions complexes de jeux vidéo ;</li><li>Garder le contact avec les récents résultats de recherche sur l'IA et mettre en œuvre / améliorer les algorithmes DNN gagnants ;</li><li>Enquêter en collaboration avec le directeur, tout partenariat potentiel avec différents départements de nos productions de jeux pour ajouter de l'IA dans ces processus / systèmes.</li> </ul> Expériences et Qualifications : <ul> <li>Baccalauréat, Maîtirse en Progammation, Math, Physique ou dans un domaine quantitative similaire. Doctorat considéré comme un plus.</li><li>5 ans d'expérience ou plus en Programmation d'intelligence artificielle ou expérience équivalente.</li><li>Maîtrise des scripts C / C ++, Python, Unix / Linux</li><li>Expérience avec OpenCV ou d'autres bibliothèques de vision par ordinateur</li><li>Expérience avec les méthodes communes d'apprentissage automatique.</li><li>L'expérience avec Caffe, Theano, Keras ou Tensor Flow est un plus</li><li>L'expérience de production de jeux vidéo est un plus.</li> </ul> Qualités interpersonnelles : <ul> <li>Motivé et autonome</li><li>Capable d'initier une conversation avec des pairs, afin de mieux comprendre comment ils fonctionnent et de développer plus de solution basée sur l'intelligence artificielle en interne.</li><li>Curiosité</li> </ul> Motivations et intérêts : La passion et l’ambition pour les jeux vidéo sont essentielles! <br/><br/> Title: Machine Learning Specialist <br/><br/> Report to: Director LABS <br/><br/> Functions: <ul> <li>Responsible for developing computer vision and machine learning based technologies for deployment for the videogames;</li><li>Experiment with real-world data to validate, evaluate and improve the algorithms;</li><li>Responsible for productizing the CV/ML algorithms into product features, with support and guidance from other system engineering teams;</li><li>Profile the software stack, develop and run Performance tests, help minimize inefficiencies/latency and improve performance;</li><li>Setup and maintain ‘Continuous Integration’ for features and releases;</li><li>Coordinate the development with cross functional teams based locally, but also out of other company’s offices;</li><li>Designing, training and deploying neural networks for complex videogames functions;</li><li>Keeping up with recent AI research results and implementing/improving on winning DNN algorithms;</li><li>Investigate with the director, any potentially partnership with different department of our game productions for adding AI into those process/systems</li> </ul> Experience and qualifications: <ul> <li>Bachelors, Masters in Computer Science, Math, Physics or similarly quantitative-heavy background. PhD is a bonus.</li><li>5+ years in AI Programming or equivalent experience.</li><li>Proficiency in C/C++, Python, Unix/Linux scripting.</li><li>Experience with OpenCV or other computer vision libraries.</li><li>Experience with common Machine Learning methods.</li><li>Experience with Caffe, Theano, Keras or Tensor flow is a plus.</li><li>Videogame production experience is a plus.</li> </ul> Interpersonal skills: <ul> <li>Self-motivated and autonomous</li><li>Capable of initiating conversation with peers, in order to understand better how they work and to develop more AI based solution internally.</li><li>Curiosity</li> </ul> Motivation and interest: Ambition and passion for video games are essential!</div>
Title: Sr. Machine Learning Specialist

Job_Description: Facebook's mission is to give people the power to build community and bring the world closer together. Through our family of apps and services, we're building a different kind of company that connects billions of people around the world, gives them ways to share what matters most to them, and helps bring people closer together. Whether we're creating new products or helping a small business expand its reach, people at Facebook are builders at heart. Our global teams are constantly iterating, solving problems, and working together to empower people around the world to build community and connect in meaningful ways. Together, we can help people build stronger communities we're just getting started.Facebook is seeking a Research Scientist to join Facebook AI Research (FAIR), a research organization focused on making significant progress in AI. Individuals in this role are expected to be recognized experts in identified research areas such as artificial intelligence, machine learning, computational statistics, and applied mathematics, particularly including areas such as deep learning, graphical models, reinforcement learning, computer perception, natural language processing and data representation. The ideal candidate will have a keen interest in producing new science to understand intelligence and technology to make computers more intelligent.To learn more about our research visit https://research.facebook.com (https://research.facebook.com/). <br/><br/> <strong>Responsibilities:</strong>  <ul> <li>Lead research to advance the science and technology of intelligent machines.</li><li>Lead research that enables learning the semantics of data (images, video, text, audio, speech and other modalities).</li><li>Devise better data-driven models of human behavior.</li><li>Work towards long-term ambitious research goals, while identifying intermediate milestones.</li><li>Influence progress of relevant research communities by producing publications.</li><li>Contribute research that can be applied to Facebook product development.</li><li>Lead and collaborate on research projects within a globally based team.</li> </ul>  <strong>Mininum Qualifications:</strong>  <ul> <li>Currently holding a faculty, industry, or government researcher position.</li><li>Ph.D. and publications in machine learning, AI, computer science, statistics, applied mathematics, data science, or related technical fields.</li><li>Experience leading a team in solving analytical problems using quantitative approaches.</li><li>Experience manipulating and analyzing data from different sources.</li><li>Experience in theoretical and empirical research and for answering questions with research.</li><li>Ability to communicate research both in writing and for public audiences of peers.</li><li>Knowledge in a programming language.</li><li>Ability to obtain and maintain work authorization in the country of employment in 2018.</li> </ul>  <strong>Preferred Qualifications:</strong>  <ul> <li>1+ year(s) of work experience in within a university, industry, or government lab(s), in a role with primary emphasis on AI research.</li><li>Experience driving original scholarship in collaboration with a team.</li><li>First-author publications at peer-reviewed AI conferences (e.g. NIPS, CVPR, ICML, ICLR, ICCV, and ACL).</li><li>Experience in developing and debugging in C/C++, Python, C# and/or Java.</li> </ul>
Title: Research Scientist (AI)

Products developed by Axiom Zen have touched 200+ million consumers and are used by the worlds leading organizations. Recent successes include CryptoKitties, the first mainstream application of blockchain technology outside cryptocurrency. <br/><br/> <strong>Your mission:</strong> <br/><br/> Support the development of a best-in-class financial reporting and forecasting function. To create value through increased insight into operational performance, identification, and execution on high ROI initiatives, and optimization of capital opportunities across the Axiom Zen portfolio. <br/><br/> <strong>What well accomplish together:</strong>  <ul> <li>Partner with the CFO and Controller to build out the finance function of a company that is on the tipping point of growing from 80 to 200 in the next 6 months.</li> <li>Assess and implement controls and best practices to support multiple business that are scaling in industries including blockchain, SaaS, mobile apps, AI, and machine learning.</li> <li>Develop and execute on strategic objectives to drive value creation across the organization.</li> <li>Spearhead and apply for various financial incentives set up by the province.</li>   <li>Youll be mentored by a CFO who comes from one of the leading investment firms in the world; youll get exposure to the diligence and underwriting process as part of managing a multi-million dollar portfolio.</li> </ul> <strong>Does this describe you?</strong>  <ul> <li>You have relevant accounting experience, particularly in reconciliation of accounts receivable and accounts payable.</li> <li>You have demonstrated success in environments that require managing multiple deadlines and stakeholders, and can quickly adapt to changing priorities.</li> <li>You are self-motivated with tenacity, attention to detail, and the ability to bring workflows to completion.</li> <li>You are passionate about learning what makes the business tick and finding ways to improve processes.</li> <li>You are excited about emerging technology like blockchain, SaaS, mobile apps, AI, and machine learning.</li> </ul> <strong>How to apply:</strong>  <ul> <li>Please include your resume and cover letter.</li> <li>Provide an answer to the following in 300 words or less: <br/> How do you envision the ability of the Finance & Accounting team to drive strategic / operational value?</li> </ul> <strong>More about Axiom Zen:</strong> <br/><br/> Axiom Zen is also the team behind ZenHub, the worlds leading collaboration solution for technical teams; and the creator of Toby, tab management with personality recognized as Top Chrome Extension of the year by both Google and Product Hunt. Axiom Zens work has been featured in The New York Times, The Wall Street Journal, TIME, and Fast Company.

Title: AI Researcher in Computer Vision

Job_Description: Company Overview:<div><div><div>Chez Nuance, nous donnons aux gens la possibilité d'interagir naturellement avec leurs divers appareils connectés et le monde numérique autour d'eux. Nous créons un monde où la technologie pense et agit de la façon dont les humains le font en concevant des modes d'interaction avec la technologie plus intuitifs. <br/><br/> Notre technologie agile utilise des analyses et des algorithmes avancés pour transformer l'inanimé en animé et transformer des processus complexes en processus simples. <br/><br/> Joignez-vous à notre équipe mobile ... où les systèmes intelligents sont maintenant prêts pour la route. Nous sommes passionnés par le développement d'interfaces intelligentes qui permettent aux gens de parler à leurs voitures, leurs téléphones et tous autres appareils intelligents. <br/><br/> At Nuance, we empower people with the ability to seamlessly interact with their connected devices and the digital world around them. We are creating a world where technology thinks and acts the way people do by designing the most human, natural, and intuitive ways of interacting with technology. <br/><br/> Our nimble technology uses analytics and advanced algorithms to transform the inanimate into animate and reduce complicated processes into simple ones. <br/><br/> Join our Mobile team…;intelligent systems now ready for the road. We are passionate about developing intelligent interfaces that enable people to talk to their cars, phones, devices, and other smart “things”.</div></div></div>Job Summary:<div><div><div>*English will follow* <br/><br/> Le candidat poursuivra une recherche de pointe alignée avec le plan AI à long terme de Nuance. L'accent sera mis sur le développement ou l'amélioration des modèles d'apprentissage pour la compréhension du langage naturel. Dans le cadre de ce travail, le candidat doit publier des articles dans des revues et des conférences prestigieuses <br/><br/> Responsabilités: <br/><br/> • Mener des recherches et des expériences pour développer ou améliorer des modèles d'apprentissage pour la compréhension du langage naturel. <br/><br/> • Implémenter des prototypes pour tester de nouvelles idées et algorithmes. <br/><br/> • Analyser et améliorer les performances des algorithmes existants. <br/><br/> • Publier des articles dans des revues et des conférences renommées. <br/><br/> • Transférer les connaissances aux équipes productrices d'idées de recherche. <br/><br/> • Effectuer des tâches liées à la sécurisation et à la conservation des produits, outils et processus dont vous êtes responsable de la sécurité. <br/><br/> QualificationsNombre d'années d'expérience de travail: 2+ <br/><br/> Compétences requises: <br/><br/> • Doctorat en machine / apprentissage en profondeur ou domaine connexe. <br/><br/> • Maîtrise des bibliothèques d'apprentissage automatique telles que TensorFlow ou pyTorch. <br/><br/> • Bonnes capacités de programmation et de débogage; capable de prototyper efficacement des idées de recherche. <br/><br/> • Expérimenter des expériences de précision et améliorer systématiquement les performances. <br/><br/> • Devrait être capable de prendre des initiatives, mais aussi de suivre un plan et de bien travailler en équipe. <br/><br/> • Bonnes aptitudes à la communication (écrite et orale). <br/><br/> Compétences préférées: <br/><br/> • Maintenir les publications d'apprentissage dans des revues et des conférences. <br/><br/> • Bonne connaissance des techniques de pointe en compréhension du langage naturel, ainsi qu'une bonne compréhension des défis dans ce domaine. <br/><br/> • Solide expérience dans un langage de script (par exemple Python). <br/><br/> • Expérience de travail dans un environnement Linux. <br/><br/> Formation: PhD en machine learning ou deep learning ou dans un domaine connexe. <br/><br/> -------------- <br/><br/> Summary: The candidate will pursue cutting edge research aligned with Nuance’s long term AI roadmap. The focus will be on developing or improving deep learning models for Natural Language Understanding. As part of this work, the candidate is expected to publish papers in renowned journals and conferences. <br/><br/> Responsibilities: <br/><br/> • Conduct research and experiments to develop or improve deep learning models for Natural Language Understanding.   <ul> <li>Implement prototypes to test new ideas and algorithms.</li> <li>Analyze and improve performance of existing algorithms.</li> <li>Publish papers in renowned journals and conferences.</li> <li>Transfer knowledge to teams productizing research ideas. <br/><br/> • Perform tasks related to securing and keeping the products, tools, and processes that you are responsible for security. <br/><br/> Qualifications <br/><br/> Number of Years of Work Experience: 2+ <br/><br/> Required Skills: <br/><br/> • PhD in machine / deep learning or closely related field.</li> <li>Mastery of machine learning libraries such as TensorFlow or pyTorch.</li> <li>Good programming and debugging skills; able to prototype research ideas effectively.</li> <li>Experience running accuracy experiments and systematically improving performance.</li> <li>Should be able to take initiative, but also follow a plan and work well as part of a team.</li> <li>Good communication skills (written and oral). <br/><br/> Preferred Skills: <br/><br/> • Track record of deep learning publications in renowned journals and conferences.</li> <li>Good knowledge of the state of the art techniques in Natural Language Understanding, as well as a good understanding of the challenges in this field.</li> <li>Strong experience in a scripting language (e.g. Python).</li> <li>Experience working in Linux environment. <br/><br/> Education: PhD in machine / deep learning or closely related field.</div></div></div>Additional Information:<div><div><div>In Montreal: <br/><br/> What we offer ! <br/><br/> <strong>Unique environment for collaborative teamwork on cutting-edge technology:</strong></li>  </ul>   <ul> <li>Location is in the heart of downtown</li><li>Flexible hours</li><li>Transit reimbursement and parking</li> </ul> <strong>Contributing to and collaborating with international teams that drive innovation</strong> <ul> <li>Competitive benefit package:</li><li>4 weeks’ vacation</li><li>10 paid sick days</li><li>Bonus Plan, Group RRSP, Deferred Profit Sharing Plan, Employee Stock Purchase Plan</li> </ul> <strong>Award-winning Top Employer:</strong> <ul> <li>Canada's Top 100 Employers – 7 consecutive years</li><li>Montreal’s Top Employers – 6 consecutive years</li><li>Canada's Top Employers for Young People - 3 consecutive years</li> </ul> Ce que nous offrons! <br/><br/> <strong>Un environnement unique et collaboratif où vous travaillez avec les technologies de pointe :</strong> <ul> <li>Situé au cœur du centre-ville de Montréal</li><li>Horaire flexible</li><li>Allocation de transport en commun et de stationnement</li><li>Travail de concert avec des équipes à l’international afin de repousser les limites de l’innovation</li> </ul> <strong>Programme d’avantages sociaux concurrentiel :</strong> <ul> <li>4 semaines de vacances</li><li>10 congés de maladies payés</li><li>Régime de bonus annuel, REER collectif, Régimes de participation différée aux bénéfices (RPDB), Régime de rachat d’action pour les employés</li> </ul> <strong>Gagnant de prix à titre de meilleurs employeurs :</strong> <ul> <li>Canada's Top 100 Employers – pour 7 années consécutives</li><li>Canada's Top Employers for Young People - pour 3 années consécutives</li></ul></div> </div></div><div>Options<div><div>Apply for this job onlineApply</div><div>Share</div><div>Refer this job to a friendRefer</div></div><div><div>Sorry the Share function is not working properly at this moment.
